aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.titledes: Empowering learners with quality content and modern web solutions — built with passion and precision.

header.titleDes: Discover the joy of learning. EduX helps you explore knowledge and growth.

chooseUs.title: Why Our Schools are the Right Fit for Your Child?
chooseUs.titleDes: Our schools inspire growth, creativity, and curiosity. We nurture every child to reach their full potential.

clientsTestimonials.title: Parents Testimonials
clientsTestimonials.titleDes: Our community of parents shares their experiences and thoughts about the learning journey and growth their children enjoy with us.

card.card1des: Emily’s child has become confident and curious thanks to engaging lessons and caring teachers.
card.card2des: Luna is a creative thinker, bringing imaginative ideas to everything she does.
card.card3des: Harry is courageous and determined, always facing challenges head-on.
card.card4des: Hermione is highly intelligent and diligent, excelling in every task she undertakes.
card.card5des: Ron is loyal and brave, supporting his friends through thick and thin.

ourPartners.title: Our Partners
ourPartners.titledes: We collaborate with trusted educational partners to provide quality learning, innovation, and growth opportunities for every student.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.titledes: We are dedicated to nurturing young minds, fostering curiosity, and providing a supportive environment where every student can thrive.

other.title: We offer a high Quality Blend of Co-Curricular Activities, Sports and Academics
other.des: Our school balances academics, sports, and co-curricular activities to foster well-rounded development and ignite every student’s passion for learning.

members.title: Improving Skills, Meet our team
members.des1: Our Team is composed of passionate IT educators and industry professionals who are dedicated to helping learners achieve their goals.
members.des2: We believe that everyone deserves access to top-notch education, and that is why we have built a platform that makes IT skills approachable, engaging, and effective. But we know that mastering technology is just one step in personal and professional growth, which is why our instructors focus on developing well-rounded skills, problem-solving abilities, and critical thinking alongside technical knowledge. Our team is constantly researching emerging trends and creating new courses to keep learners ahead in the fast-paced tech industry.
members.des3: Our platform makes IT skills approachable and engaging, while our instructors guide learners in building well-rounded skills, problem-solving, and critical thinking for future growth.

uploadFile.title: Upload Your Exercise
uploadFile.titledes: Drag or click to upload problem file

uploadSolution.title: Upload Solution
uploadSolution.titledes: Drag or click to upload solution file

macoutTutorial.des1: I am the mascot here to guide you.
macoutTutorial.des2: Please choose the class that suits you.
macoutTutorial.des3: Choose the subject you want to submit your assignment for.
macoutTutorial.des4: Click or drag your assignment file here.
macoutTutorial.des5: Click or drag your completed work file here.
macoutTutorial.des6: Once the files are uploaded, click Submit to send them.
macoutTutorial.des7: View AI explanations and feedback here.
macoutTutorial.des8: Wish you a great learning experience!
